title: Troubleshooting Mobile App Issues
content:
Common mobile app troubleshooting steps:

1. Verify app version (check app store for updates):
   - iOS: Requires iOS 14.0 or later
   - Android: Requires Android 8.0 or later

2. Login issues:
   - Confirm same credentials as online banking
   - Check for account lockout due to failed attempts
   - Verify biometric authentication is properly set up

3. App performance problems:
   - Force close app and restart
   - Check available device storage (need 1GB free minimum)
   - Restart device if app continues to freeze

4. Connection issues:
   - Verify strong WiFi or cellular signal
   - Try switching between WiFi and cellular data
   - Check if other banking apps are working

5. Feature-specific issues:
   - Mobile deposit: Ensure proper lighting and check positioning
   - Bill pay: Verify payee information and account balances
   - Transfers: Check daily transfer limits

6. If issues persist: Uninstall and reinstall app, or escalate to Digital Banking Support.

Note: Business hours for Digital Banking Support: Mon-Fri 8AM-8PM ET, Sat-Sun 9AM-5PM ET.
